node.name: Architexa for Eclipse 3.x
node.shortdescription:
Too Much Code? Architexa makes it easy for you to examine your code!

The tool suite helps build useful diagrams to help developers Quickly Understand Code and Document In Seconds. Unlike typical UML/modeling tools, Architexa is designed to be code-centric - around your needs. Developers can easily:

- Make sense of your code with quick visualizations of key components.

- Take advantage of powerful interactive exploration of the diagrams.

- Document code architecture and share discussions with team members.

Watch a short 3-minute overview video for an introduction to the powerful capabilities offered.

Get high level overviews quickly using Layered Diagrams:

Examine various code relationships in one place with Class Diagrams:

Understand code behavior and logic using Sequence Diagrams:

Download Architexa to easily understand and document your code with a free, 30 day trial.
